attributes.action: Reinstate NYE FIREWORKS for London to see in 2022.
attributes.additional_details: Force the hand of the London mayor. The people of London need something to look forward to. It will be embarrassing on the global stage to not have any government organised fireworks.
attributes.background: Want the London Fireworks to be reinstated for this year. Seems unfair to not have them especially with all the council tax increases and rises in congestion charge. Need to give something back.

rejection.details:
This is a matter for the Mayor of London, not the UK Government or Parliament. The UK Government is therefore unable to make the change your petition calls for.

You could start a petition to the Mayor, calling for them to make this change, if that is something you'd like to see happen. You can find out how to do this here: https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions.
